app_help: Help us to translate and improve the translation for your language. Your input may be available in our next release!
msg_versao_frota: This feature is only available to fleet management plan subscribers.

email_envia_com_codigo: An email was sent with the code.
erro_versao_craqueada: Your account has been disabled for using a cracked version of Drivvo.
msg_email_instrucoes_usuario: An email was sent to the registered user, with access instructions.
erro_cadastrar_usuario: There was a problem registering the user!
erro_quantidade_usuario: You have already registered the maximum number of users.
limite_usuarios_novo_plano: Purchase a new plan to register more users.
veiculo_usuario_descricao: Select the vehicles that the user will be able to access.
solicitar_acesso_veiculo: Request access to a vehicle to the fleet manager.
limite_veiculos_numero_maximo: You have reached the maximum number of active vehicles.
limite_veiculos_novo_plano: Upgrade the current plan to be able to register more vehicles.
limite_veiculos_editar_veiculo_antigo: Or edit an old vehicle and mark it as inactive to be able to register a new vehicle.
descricao_gestor: It has access to all vehicles, can manage and register new drivers.
descricao_motorista: The driver has access only to the vehicle selected by the fleet manager.
plano_free_descricao: For individuals who want to keep up with their vehicle
plano_pro_descricao: For personal use and for who use their vehicle for work
plano_frota_descricao: For fleets with up to {{V1}} vehicles and {{V2}} drivers
plano_frota_10_descricao: For fleets with up to 10 vehicles and 10 drivers
plano_frota_25_descricao: For fleets with up to 25 vehicles and 25 drivers
plano_frota_50_descricao: For fleets with up to 50 vehicles and 50 drivers
registros_insuficientes_descricao: You don’t have enough entries in the selected dates to generate this chart.
ate_dois_motoristas_voce_dependente: Up to 2 drivers (you and a dependent)
cadastros_ilimitados: Unlimited registrations of refueling, expenses, services and routes
sincronizacao_entre_dispositivos: Seamless sync between your computers and devices
acesso_ilimitado: Unlimited access via web, iOS and Android apps
armazenamento_total_utilizado: You reached the maximum file storage limit.
erro_download_arquivo: There was a problem downloading the file.
versao_web_computador: Hello. For now our web version can only be accessed from computers. To use Drivvo on your phone download our app. Thanks.
baixe_nosso_aplicativo: Hello. Download our app to have a better experience on your phone.
lembrete_sera_adicionado_automaticamente: A reminder will be automatically added
responderemos_em_breve: We will get back to you as soon as possible.
como_chamar_veiculo: How would you like to call your vehicle?
nenhum_registro_ultimo_mes: No entries in the last 30 days
comece_gerenciamento_gratuito: Start managing your vehicle for free
erro_quantidade_caracteres_senha: Use 6 characters or more for your password.
motorista_descricao: Register an extra user to manage vehicles with you.
erro_cadastrar_motorista: An error occurred while registering the driver.
erro_buscar_motoristas: An error occurred while searching for drivers.
erro_quantidade_motoristas: You have already registered the maximum number of drivers.
msg_ativar_veiculo: To register new information you must activate the vehicle.
msg_permissao_administrador: This functionality is available only to the account administrator.
erro_versao_pro_administrador: Your account administrator's PRO subscription has expired or been canceled.
desejo_apagar_conta: I want to delete my account
erro_apagar_conta: There was a problem deleting the account.
msg_configuracao_media_ultimo_abastecime: This setting moves the display of the previous refuelling average to the last refuelling.
descricao_assinatura_ios: Drivvo PRO will automatically renew within 24 hours before the end of the subscription period and you will be charged through your iTunes account. You can manage your subscription in Account Settings.
receitas_ilimitadas_descricao: Track your earnings by registering unlimited incomes each month.
erro_odometro_data_receita: The odometer and date data are conflicting with a previous income ({{V1}} - {{V2}}).
add_primeiro_tipo_receita: Add your first type of income
msg_versao_pro_receita: You have already registered an income this month. Sign the PRO version and have unlimited income registration.
permissao_local_descricao: Please, allow using the location service, to make it easier to identify your location.
permissao_local_erro: Without permission, we cannot identify your location.
permissao_local_configuracoes: To identify your location, we need your permission.
voce_esta_no_posto: Are you at the gas station?
seu_carro_precisa_ar: Is your car feeling a bit flat?
sua_moto_precisa_ar: Is your motorcycle feeling a bit flat?
seu_onibus_precisa_ar: Is your bus feeling a bit flat?
seu_caminhao_precisa_ar: Is your truck feeling a bit flat?
msg_calibragem: You can save up to 20% of your fuel cost by keeping your tires always pumped up.
descricao_assinatura: Note: Subscriptions automatically renew if they are not cancelled at least 24 hours before the subscription terms. You can disable automatic renewal in the system settings.
politica_privacidade_termos_uso: Privacy policy and terms of use
msg_inativo: When inactive, you will not receive notifications for this vehicle.
mostrar_media_ultimo_abastecimento: Show average in the last refueling
msg_manutencao_programada: We are performing a scheduled maintenance, please try again in 10 minutes.
msg_editar_configuracao_veiculo: You must edit your vehicle to change this setting.
proximo_abastecimento_nao_registrado: The next refuelling was not registered.
atualizar_mensagem: A new version of Drivvo is available, with new features. Please update your app in the next {{V1}} days. Thank you!
tipo_combustivel_diferentes: The fuel type of the second tank should be different from the main tank
beneficios_ter_conta: Some benefits are available only to users who have accounts.
estou_ciente_sem_beneficios: I am aware that i will not have these benefits
marca_nao_encontrada: If you do not find the brand of your vehicle, select the "Other" at the bottom of the list.
disponibilizar_marca: We will provide the new brand in the next version.
backup_dados_nuvem: Backup data of your vehicle in the cloud
aproveite_versao_pro: Enjoy even more with Drivvo PRO
senha_diferente: Password is different from the current one!
necessario_alterar_senha: You need to register a new password!
dados_local_web: You have data on your device and in your cloud backup. Which one do you want to use?
substituir_dados_nuvem: Cloud data will be replaced by local data
substituir_dados_local: Local data will be replaced by cloud data
deve_sincronizar: You have to synchronize your data
assinatura_nao_disponivel: We are sorry, subscriptions are not yet supported on your device.
permissao_storage_backup_descricao: To find your backup, the app needs permission to read your files.
permissao_storage_backup_erro: It's not possible to restore the backup without permission.
permissao_storage_backup_configuracoes: To restore this backup, you'll need to permit the option to "search your files" first.
permissao_storage_exportar_descricao: To export your data you need to allow the app to record your files.
permissao_storage_exportar_erro: You cannot export your data without granting permission.
permissao_storage_exportar_configuracoes: Permission is required to export your data.
cadastre_primeiro_abastecimento: Click {{V1}} and add your first refueling, expense, service or income.
sem_anuncios_descricao: Remove adverts from Drivvo to get the best experience!
controle_dados_descricao: Export the data concerning your vehicles in CSV/Excel.
graficos_mais_recursos_descricao: Setting and share the graphics generated by Drivvo.
atualizacoes_pro_descricao: Receive future Pro features for free.
conheca_as_novidades: Know more about the changes we have prepared for this version.
crie_uma_conta: Create an account, and synchronize your data across all your devices.
mantenha_dados_seguros: Keep your data safe even in the event of theft, loss or device exchange.
acompanhe_historico: Follow the historical costs of your vehicle on a timeline.
add_primeiro_tipo_despesa: Add your first type of expense
add_primeiro_tipo_servico: Add your first type of service
erro_buscar_correcoes: Occur an error finding the corrections!
erro_login: There was a problem logging in.
erro_criar_conta: There was a problem creating your account.
erro_editar_conta: There was a problem editing your account.
erro_alterar_senha: There was a problem changing your password.
erro_enviar_senha: There was a problem sending your password.
erro_email_cadastrado: The email you have entered is already in use.
erro_email_invalido: The email address entered is not valid!
msg_eviar_senha: Password sent successfully, check your email!
msg_enviar_nova_senha: Sent a new password to your email!
msg_logoff: When you log out, all expenses will be deleted from this device. Be sure to synchronise manually, in order to save the latest data to your account!
msg_cadastrar_posto: For even more detailed reports recommend that you sign the petrol station.
msg_versao_pro: This feature is only available in the PRO version. Get this and other features with a PRO membership!
intro_texto_01: Now you can more quickly and easily track the expenses of your vehicle.
intro_texto_04: Or even for a family trip
intro_texto_05: Track your vehicle expenses with Drivvo.
google_play_breve_descricao: Keep your car healthy and control all your expenses with Drivvo.
google_play_text: Manage your vehicle expenses quickly and easily. With Drivvo you can track refueling and maintenance services, generate reports, and setup reminders for important events for your vehicle.
google_play_screen_01: Register your refuellings and check them whenever you need.
google_play_screen_02: Track the expenses for one or more vehicles.
google_play_screen_03: Full reports about refuelings, expenses and services.
google_plays_creen_04: Generate detailed charts, which you can save and share.
google_play_screen_05: Calculate the autonomy of your vehicles directly within Drivvo.
google_play_screen_06: On mobile or tablet, keep your spending updated.
google_play_screen_07: A modern design that fits your needs.
ja_sabe_quanto_gasta: Now you know how much you spend on your vehicle.
merecer_estrelas: Don't you think we deserve 5 stars?
erro_odometro_data_abastecimento: The odometer and date data are conflicting with a previous refueling ({{V1}} - {{V2}}).
erro_odometro_data_despesa: The odometer and date data are conflicting with a previous expense ({{V1}} - {{V2}}).
erro_odometro_data_servico: The odometer and date data are conflicting with a previous service ({{V1}} - {{V2}}).
erro_excluir_selecionados: One or more items could not be deleted. To delete, make sure the data is not in use.
erro_excluir: Unable to delete, make sure that it is not being used.
erro_odometro: The odometer should be after the last refuelling
erro_data: The date should be after the last refuelling
erro_data_hoje: The date should be after today
erro_nao_exite_local: There is no expense registered with this local.
erro_memoria: External storage is not available, unable to create backup and restore.
erro_restaurar_backup: An error occurred while restoring the backup.
erro_dados_exportados: An error occurred while exporting the data.
erro_armazenamento_externo: External storage is not available, check your SD card.
erro_dif_odometro: Final odometer must exceed the initial odometer.
erro_dif_datas: End date must be after the start date.
erro_abastecimento_duplicado: There is already a refueling registered for this odometer value.
msg_excluir: Do you really want to delete?
msg_excluir_selecionados: Do you really want to delete the selected items?
msg_excluir_selecionado: Do you really want to delete the selected item?

msg_restaurar_backup: Do you really want to restore this backup?
msg_concluir: You are ready to control the expenses of your vehicles.
msg_media_zero: The average is calculated between two full tanks.
msg_versao_teste_expirou: Your trial version has expired. Contact the developer or download a new version on Google Play.
atualizar_descricao: A new version of Drivvo is available. Upgrade now and check out the new features.
versao_pro_pirata: There was a problem with your payment, please contact the developer.
card_check: Congratulations! You are ready to control the expenses of your vehicles.
badge_check: Started monitoring your vehicle expenses with Drivvo.
card_10_postos: King of the petrol stations! You refueled in 10 different places.
card_vip: You are VIP! Fueled more than {{V1}} times in the same place.
badge_vip: Fueled {{V1}} times in the same place.
card_ano: You have completed 1 year monitoring your vehicle costs with Drivvo.
card_anos: You have completed {{V1}} years monitoring your vehicle.
card_abastecimento: Congratulations! You added your first fueling in Drivvo.
card_abastecimentos: This was your {{V1}}th fueling with Drivvo.
card_tanque_cheio: This was your {{V1}}th full tank with Drivvo.
notificacao_registrar_abastecimento: Do not forget to register your refuelings.
notificacao_mantenha_controle: Keep your vehicle monitoring up to date!
notificacao_exportar_csv: Your data has been successfully exported.
notificacao_exportar_grafico: Your chart has been successfully exported.
restaurar_backup_descricao: If you have changed your phone, restore your data here.
restaurar_backup_descricao_3: You can also restore data from other apps.
assinatura_cancelada: Your subscription has been cancelled! Your benefits will be available until the end of your subscription period.
